name: ghostarr
description: Ghostarr - Newsletter generator for media server administrators

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd src/backend && source .venv/bin/activate 2>/dev/null || true && uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload
scripts.install:all: npm ci && npm run setup:backend && cd src/frontend && npm ci
scripts.setup:backend: cd src/backend && python -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && pip install -e .
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
